data.title: Buy U2 : Stay (Faraway, So Close!) - The Swing Format (CD, Single) Online for a great price
data.meta_description: U2 : Stay (Faraway, So Close!) - The Swing Format (CD, Single) is available for sale at our shop at a great price. We have a huge collection of Vinyl's, CD's, Cassettes & other formats available for sale for music lovers
data.text:
Media Condition: Very Good Plus (VG+)

Sleeve Condition: Very Good Plus (VG+)

Notes:

Track 1 from the album Zooropa Track 2 from the Frank Sinatra album DUETS Mastered at Sterling Sound, NYC and at the Mastering Lab, LA. Track 3 and 4 unreleased, 122 BPM each. Capitol logo appears on inside of cover and on disc. Island logo appears on cover flap and on disc. Phonogram logo appears on cover flap. This release was also packaged in a box set with the album Zooropa.

1. U2 - Stay (Faraway, So Close!) 4:58

2. Frank Sinatra, Bono - I've Got You Under My Skin 3:31

3. U2 - Lemon (Bad Yard Club Edit) 5:19

4. U2 - Lemon (Perfecto Mix) 8:57
